ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHANNEL_ID = #{record.channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RECON_ID = #{record.reconId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update t_recon_exception_trade
CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RECON_ID = #{reconId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYER_ACCOUNT = #{payerAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYER_NAME = #{payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYEE_ACCOUNT = #{payeeAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYEE_NAME = #{payeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

TRADE_STATUS_DESC = #{tradeStatusDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

EXCEPTION_TYPE = #{record.exceptionType,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_recon_exception_trade set CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RECON_ID = #{reconId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYER_ACCOUNT = #{payerAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYER_NAME = #{payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYEE_ACCOUNT = #{payeeAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYEE_NAME = #{payeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_CODE = #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_AMOUNT = #{tradeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRADE_STATUS = #{tradeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_STATUS_DESC = #{tradeStatusDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXCEPTION_REASON = #{exceptionReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXCEPTION_TYPE = #{record.exceptionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into t_recon_exception_trade ( CHANNEL_ID, recon_id, order_no, payer_account, payer_name, payee_account, payee_name, bank_code, trade_amount, trade_status, trade_status_desc, exception_reason, EXCEPTION_TYPE, create_time ) select #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reocnId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, b.TRADE_ORDER_NO, b.PAYER_ACCOUNT, b.PAYER_NAME, b.PAYEE_ACCOUNT, b.PAYEE_NAME, b.BANK_CODE, b.TRADE_AMOUNT, b.TRADE_STATUS, b.TRADE_STATUS_DESC, '【短款】系统不存在该订单', #{exceptionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SYSDATE() from t_recon_channel_bohai b where not EXISTS(select * from t_trade t where b.TRADE_ORDER_NO = t.plat_order_no) and b.TRADE_STATUS = 1
mapper.update: update t_trade t,t_recon_channel_bohai b,t_recon_exception_trade e set t.recon_status = b.TRADE_STATUS, t.recon_date = SYSDATE(), b.RECON_STATUS = 1 where e.ORDER_NO = t.order_no AND e.ORDER_NO = b.TRADE_ORDER_NO AND t.plat_order_no = b.TRADE_ORDER_NO AND e.EXCEPTION_TYPE = 2
mapper.delete: delete b from t_trade t,t_recon_channel_bohai b,t_recon_exception_trade e where e.ORDER_NO = t.order_no AND e.ORDER_NO = b.TRADE_ORDER_NO AND t.plat_order_no = b.TRADE_ORDER_NO AND e.EXCEPTION_TYPE = 2
mapper.insert:
insert into t_recon_exception_trade ( CHANNEL_ID, recon_id, order_no, payer_account, payer_name, payee_account, payee_name, bank_code, trade_amount, trade_status, trade_status_desc, exception_reason, EXCEPTION_TYPE, create_time )values
( #{item.channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.reconId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.payerAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.payeeAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.payeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tradeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.tradeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tradeStatusDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.exceptionReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.exceptionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
